Knack | US Remote | AWS Engineer | https://knack.com/work-at-knack

Knack's goal is to democratize data and make it easy for for anyone to unlock the power of their data with apps, workflows, and integrations.

We're hiring a AWS/DevOps engineer to help us build and manage a container-based infrastructure for deploying thousands of database-driven applications.

You'll be diving deep into AWS and containers. Other tech we use: Node.js, MariaDB, MongoDB, Redis, Ceph, Fission, Salt, Sensu and Graylog.

We've been 100% remote for over 4 years. You'll be joining a small team that is just as focused on enjoying the journey as the destination.

More info: https://knack.com/about

Apply: https://www.knack.com/devops
